mapper.insert: insert into device( departmentCode_t, deviceName_t, deviceIMEI_t) values (#{departmentCode},#{deviceName},#{deviceIMEI})
mapper.select:
select deviceIMEI_t as deviceIMEI, deviceInfo_t as deviceInfo, deviceName_t as deviceName, deviceDefaultPWD_t as deviceDefaultPWD, departmentCode_t as departmentCode from device where 1=1
and deviceName_t like "%"#{deviceName}"%"
and deviceIMEI_t like "%"#{deviceIMEI}"%"
and departmentCode_t =#{departmentCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task ( taskCode_t, proposerCode_t, deviceIMEI_t, taskTime_t, taskStatus_t ) values (#{taskCode}, #{proposerCode}, #{deviceIMEI}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), 0)
